proposal: Understanding the essence of Flywheel, where the thrill of earning yield on any liquid asset is powered by the ever-exciting market volatility and arbitrage, we see a perfect match. With 17 holders in the ETH network already finding value in your PEAS token, why not amplify this by allowing your community to deploy their own DEX or engage in a blockchain-based lottery? Imagine the possibilities when your pods meet our B2B tools, creating a richer ecosystem for everyone involved. Let's turn the volatility you master into an opportunity for all.
